content: As the ball breaks through even further, run with it. You want it to be as far forward as it can go before you go up and to the gap on the left. Another Searing-Flame will appear here, and then you'll find a gap very close to you on the right, with yet another Searing-Flame.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass III' and the sub-subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai'.
The content is as follows:
As the ball breaks through even further, run with it. You want it to be as far forward as it can go before you go up and to the gap on the left. Another Searing-Flame will appear here, and then you'll find a gap very close to you on the right, with yet another Searing-Flame.
